title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar (OON) received the visit of His Excellency, Mr. Sean Fleming TD

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar (OON) received the visit of His Excellency, Mr. Sean Fleming TD, Minister of State for International Development and Diaspora of Ireland today, 14th March, 2024.
Discussions centered on bilateral matters, including strengthening collaboration in areas such as trade, agriculture and migration among others. Issues relating to Bilateral Air Services Agreement (BASA) were also discussed.
The visiting Minister of State was accompanied to the Ministry by the Ambassador of Ireland to Nigeria, H.E. Peter Ryan.
